topic.title: Overview
topic.shortdesc: This guide provides Bill of Material information necessary to purchase the proper hardware to deploy the Dell Red Hat Cloud Solutions with Red Hat Enterprise Linux OpenStack.

body.p: This hardware includes Dell R620, R720, and R720xd servers with Dell PowerEdge H710 disk controllers; and Dell Force10 S4810 and S55 network switches.
Please consult with your Dell sales representative to ensure proper preparation and submission of your hardware and software orders.
